name: Eagle Brand® Chocolate Truffles
author: Eagle brand
summary: These simple, yet rich homemade candies are every bit as delicious as truffles from a high-priced candy store. You can enjoy them any day or show someone you care about them with a gift from the heart and your kitchen! EAGLE BRAND® makes it easy.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
Finely chopped toasted nuts, flaked coconut, chocolate sprinkles, colored sprinkles, unsweetened cocoa, powdered sugar or colored sugars
directions: Melt chocolate chips with sweetened condensed milk in large saucepan over low heat
Remove from heat; stir in vanilla
Cover and chill 2 to 3 hours or until firm
Shape into 1-inch balls; roll in desired coating and/or decorate with frosting and candies
